message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You started high, now I'll make a move!
You're getting closer, but I'm still not satisfied. Let's meet in the middle!
Getting closer to my target, Alice!
I'm getting desperate, but I'm still willing to compromise. Can we meet in the middle again?
You're getting close to the edge, Alice!
I'm running out of options, Bob. I'll give you a better deal, but this is my last offer. Meet me in the middle one more time?
